hook.text: You check social media not for the content but for the anticipation. The craving starts before the reward arrives.

discovery.text: Wolfram Schultz showed that dopamine spikes not at the reward itself but at the cue that predicts the reward.

climax.text: Tech companies design for craving, not satisfaction. The loop never fully satisfies, so you keep coming back.

punchline.text: You don't want the reward. You want the anticipation of it.
